name: Poll Everywhere
headline: Interactive meetings and presentations
description: Poll Everywhere turns any presentation into a two-way conversation - directly in your PowerPoint, Keynote, or Google Slide deck. Participants respond to questions live using mobile phones and the results appear instantly in beautiful, animated displays. Poll Everywhere engages everyone at conferences, town halls, training sessions, marketing events, and everyday meetings. Learn more about how organizations like HP, Volvo, KPMG, and over 75% of the Fortune 500 use Poll Everywhere to get results.

founders.name: Sean Eby
founders.description:
Co-Founder of Poll Everywhere, S08.

Currently an investor in a handful of scale startups, have had a couple of exits. As well, I am a product development executive leader and currently lead and grow the engineering and product teams at ServiceCore, a private equity-backed liquid waste and roll-off vertical ERP software provider.

founders.name: Jeff Vyduna
founders.description: Plotting a different course (unfunded after YC) with Poll Everywhere. Poll Everywhere turns presenting into a two-way experience.

# Engage Your Audience
### Captivate your audience by transforming your presentation, meeting, or class into an immersive and interactive experience.
[![CTA-Buttons_Red Default](https://22544793.fs1.hubspotusercontent-na1.net/hubfs/22544793/CTA-Buttons_Red%20Default.svg)](https://www.polleverywhere.com/<https:/www.polleverywhere.com/plans?homepage_b&hsLang=en>)
![How to Use Poll Everywhere](https://22544793.fs1.hubspotusercontent-na1.net/hubfs/22544793/Gifs/PE-How-To-1.gif)

### Create Your Activity
Choose an Activity Type, enter your prompt and answers, and hit present.
![Engage the Audience](https://22544793.fs1.hubspotusercontent-na1.net/hub/22544793/hubfs/Transparent%20Background%20Illustrations/slack-command.png?width=250&height=250&name=slack-command.png)
### Engage Your Audience
See responses update in real-time as audiences submit answers via their device.
![Analyze the Results](https://22544793.fs1.hubspotusercontent-na1.net/hub/22544793/hubfs/Transparent%20Background%20Illustrations/brainstorm.png?width=250&height=250&name=brainstorm.png)
### Analyze the Results
Track participation, summarize results, and review questions asked.
![PE-How-To-2](https://22544793.fs1.hubspotusercontent-na1.net/hubfs/22544793/Gifs/PE-How-To-2.gif)
Meetings and Presentations 
#### Engage Employees
Host effective meetings and presentations with live audience engagement. Moderate questions during company-wide presentations, gauge comprehension during training sessions, and gather anonymous employee feedback.
In the Classroom 
#### Student Engagement
Create an interactive learning experience. Take attendance, quiz students on the fly, and export participation grades with reporting.
Conferences and Events 
#### Audience Engagement
Create an interactive learning experience. Take attendance, quiz students on the fly, and export participation grades with reporting.

## Explore the Activity Types
### From one-click answer options to open-ended responses.
  * ![Ranking⟨38⟩]
###  Ranking 
Ask your audience any question with predetermined answer options and have them rank from best to worst.
  * ![Open-Ended⟨61⟩]

  * ![Multiple-Choice⟨62⟩]

  * ![Word Cloud⟨63⟩]

Poll Everywhere, founded in 2008 as part of Y Combinator Batch S08, is revolutionizing the way we engage in meetings and presentations. Located in San Francisco, this SaaS company has a team of around 70 dedicated employees. Their mission is straightforward: making meetings and presentations interactive and engaging for everyone involved.

At its core, Poll Everywhere transforms standard presentations into dynamic, two-way conversations. It allows audience members to participate in real time using their mobile devices, providing instant feedback that manifests in visually appealing, animated displays. Whether it's a corporate meeting, a classroom setting, or a large-scale conference, Poll Everywhere ensures that every voice gets heard.

Notably, the platform is trusted by over 75% of Fortune 500 companies. Major organizations like HP, Volvo, and KPMG have harnessed Poll Everywhere's capabilities to enhance engagement and drive results. The environment Poll Everywhere creates is particularly beneficial in educational settings, where it helps boost student participation and track comprehension in a seamless manner.

The company has also made efforts to ensure user data security, complying with industry standards like SOC 2 and ISO certifications, which makes it a strong choice for organizations focusing on data protection.

From crowd-polling to live quizzes, Poll Everywhere supports various activity types like ranking, open-ended responses, and multiple-choice questions. It integrates neatly with tools you're likely already using, such as PowerPoint, Google Slides, and Zoom, making it easy to adopt in existing workflows.

To summarize, if you're looking to not just present information but genuinely engage your audience, Poll Everywhere provides the tools to elevate your interactions, making them more colorful and inclusive. Check them out at [Poll Everywhere](https://www.polleverywhere.com) to find the right plan that unlocks unlimited activities.
